title: Compiling Rust on Ubuntu 16.04 raises compilation error

labels.name: T-bootstrap
labels.description: Relevant to the bootstrap subteam: Rust's build system (x.py and src/bootstrap)

body:
Running `./x.py build` raises following error:

```
...
   Compiling syntax v0.0.0 (...)
   Compiling termcolor v0.3.6
error[E0463]: can't find crate for `std`

error: aborting due to previous error

For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0463`.
error: Could not compile `rustc_target`.

Caused by:
  process didn't exit successfully: `/home/user/rust/build/bootstrap/debug/rustc --crate-name build_script_build librustc_target/build.rs --error-format json --crate-type bin --emit=dep-info,link
 -C opt-level=3 --cfg feature="jemalloc" -C metadata=3de51117304bc201 -C extra-filename=-3de51117304bc201 --out-dir /home/user/rust/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1-rustc/release/build/rustc
_target-3de51117304bc201 -L dependency=/home/user/rust/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1-rustc/release/deps` (exit code: 101)
warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish...
error[E0463]: can't find crate for `std`

error: aborting due to previous error

For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0463`.
error: Could not compile `syntax`.
Caused by:                                                                                                                                                                                                 [0/1974]
  process didn't exit successfully: `/home/user/rust/build/bootstrap/debug/rustc --crate-name build_script_build libsyntax/build.rs --error-format json --crate-type bin --emit=dep-info,link -C op
t-level=3 -C metadata=f3807f78d3aa8d7c -C extra-filename=-f3807f78d3aa8d7c --out-dir /home/user/rust/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1-rustc/release/build/syntax-f3807f78d3aa8d7c -L dependenc
y=/home/user/rust/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1-rustc/release/deps` (exit code: 101)
warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish...
error[E0463]: can't find crate for `std`

error: aborting due to previous error

For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0463`.
error: Could not compile `cc`.

Caused by:
  process didn't exit successfully: `/home/user/rust/build/bootstrap/debug/rustc --crate-name cc /home/user/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/cc-1.0.10/src/lib.rs --error-format
 json --crate-type lib --emit=dep-info,link -C opt-level=3 -C metadata=c5a471959419d0da -C extra-filename=-c5a471959419d0da --out-dir /home/user/rust/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1-rustc/r
elease/deps -L dependency=/home/user/rust/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1-rustc/release/deps --cap-lints allow` (exit code: 101)
warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish...
error: build failed
command did not execute successfully: "/home/user/rust/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0/bin/cargo" "build" "--target" "x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu" "-j" "12" "--release" "--features" " jemalloc
" "--manifest-path" "/home/user/rust/src/rustc/Cargo.toml" "--message-format" "json"
expected success, got: exit code: 101
thread 'main' panicked at 'cargo must succeed', bootstrap/compile.rs:1091:9
note: Run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace.
failed to run: /home/user/rust/build/bootstrap/debug/bootstrap build
Build completed unsuccessfully in 0:36:48

```

I'm using GCC 7.3. I set `prefix` in config.toml as a local directory (/home/user/...) and `sysconfdir` as ".". I used stable branch.
